players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and keep an eye on each other during this game."
Bob: "I agree with Alice. Let's all keep a close eye on each other to ensure fair play and trust in this game."
You: "I'd like to propose that we form an alliance, Charlie and I. We can share information and keep each other updated on any suspicious activities or observations during the game."

Charlie: "I'd be happy to form an alliance with Alice as well, in the interest of maintaining fair play and trust within our group. Let's all keep each other informed of any suspicious activities or observations throughout the game."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
